xboxlive_matchmaking_start.htm+html.head: xboxlive_matchmaking_start.htm+html.body.p:87-3
xboxlive_matchmaking_start: This function must be called before you can start any multi-player session for the user. It takes the User ID pointer, which you can retrieve for a particular game pad by calling the xboxlive_user_for_pad() function, and will initialise the multi-player API.

xboxlive_matchmaking_start.htm+html.head: xboxlive_matchmaking_start.htm+html.body.table.tbody.tr.td:99-9
xboxlive_matchmaking_start: The user ID pointer to use

xboxlive_matchmaking_start.htm+html.head: xboxlive_matchmaking_start.htm+html.body.p:110-3
xboxlive_matchmaking_start: The above code gets the user ID for the given pad index and then initialises multiplayer capabilities.
